/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_11 */ WITH MST AS ( SELECT DISTINCT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS SNO1, A.COPT_CD AS AA, A.ACNT_CD AS BB, A.BLL_CD AS CC, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AS DD, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS EE, B.ORG_NM AS ORG_NM, C.ACNT_CD_NM AS SOSSEC_CD, D.ACNT_CD_NM AS HOIGYE FROM TWFAACAV024C D, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV003M B, TWFAACAV053L A WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYm#
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND B.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND B.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND B.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
AND A.COPT_CD = B.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = B.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = B.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = B.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND A.COPT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '02' AND A.ACNT_CD = D.ACNT_CD AND D.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' ), SQL_1 AS ( SELECT SUM_DVSN_ID, ACCT_CD||'-'||SSEC_CD||'-'||ITM_CD||'-'||SITM_CD AS JJ1, TQR_CLCT_DCS_AMT AS AA1, TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG AS BB1, TQR_RCP_AMT AS CC1, TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG AS DD1, TQR_RSR_AMT AS EE1, TQR_TO_RSR_ATAG AS FF1, TQR_NPM_LO_AMT AS GG1, TQR_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG AS HH1, UNP_AMT AS II1, A.COPT_CD AS AA, A.ACNT_CD AS BB, A.BLL_CD AS CC, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AS DD, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS EE FROM TWFAACAV053L A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROF_YM = #strYm# AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID NOT IN ('50', '51', '52') ), SQL_2 AS ( SELECT TQR_RCP_AMT AS CC1, TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG AS DD1, TQR_RSR_AMT AS EE1, TQR_TO_RSR_ATAG AS FF1, TQR_NPM_LO_AMT AS GG1, TQR_TO_NPM_LO_ATAG AS HH1, A.COPT_CD AS AA, A.ACNT_CD AS BB, A.BLL_CD AS CC, A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AS DD, A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS EE FROM TWFAACAV053L A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROF_YM = #strYm# AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' )
SELECT MST.AA||MST.BB||MST.CC||MST.DD||MST.EE||#strYm# AS 구분 , MST.AA||'-'||MST.BB||'-'||MST.CC||'-'||MST.DD||'-'||MST.EE AS 증명책임자부호 , #strYm# AS 증명년월 , MST.SOSSEC_CD AS 소관명 , MST.HOIGYE AS 회계명 , MST.ORG_NM AS 기관명 , CASE WHEN SQL_1.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' THEN '합계' ELSE SQL_1.JJ1 END AS 계정관항목 , SQL_1.AA1 AS 본분기A , SQL_1.BB1 AS 누계B , SQL_1.CC1 AS 본분기C , SQL_1.DD1 AS 누계D , SQL_1.EE1 AS 본분기E , SQL_1.FF1 AS 누계F , SQL_1.GG1 AS 본분기G , SQL_1.HH1 AS 누계H , SQL_1.II1 AS 미수납액 , SQL_2.CC1 AS 본기분수납액 , SQL_2.DD1 AS 본기까지누계 , SQL_2.EE1 AS 경정급 , SQL_2.FF1 AS 환급금 , SQL_2.GG1 AS 계산외납 , SQL_2.HH1 AS 한은미납입액 FROM MST, SQL_1, SQL_2 WHERE 1=1 AND MST.AA = SQL_1.AA AND MST.BB = SQL_1.BB AND MST.CC = SQL_1.CC AND MST.DD = SQL_1.DD AND MST.EE = SQL_1.EE AND MST.AA = SQL_2.AA AND MST.BB = SQL_2.BB AND MST.CC = SQL_2.CC AND MST.DD = SQL_2.DD AND MST.EE = SQL_2.EE ORDER BY 구분, SQL_1.SUM_DVSN_ID, 계정관항목

/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_12 */ SELECT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS 증명책임자부호 , A.PROF_YM AS 증명년월 , A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS 합계구분ID , A.ACCT_CD||'-'||A.SSEC_CD||'-'||A.ITM_CD||'-'||A.SITM_CD AS 관목코드 , A.TOT_CLCT_DCS_AMT AS 총징수결정액 , A.TOT_CLCT_DCS_AMT_SUM_AM AS 총징수결정액합계금액 , A.TOT_RCP_AMT AS 총수납액 , A.TOT_RCP_AMT_SUM_AM AS 총수납액합계금액 , A.TAXOFC_SIM_AMT AS 세무서간이액 , A.TAXOFC_SIM_AMT_SUM_AM AS 세무서간이액합계금액 , A.RSRAM_RSR_DCS_AMT AS 환급금환급결정액 , A.RSRAM_RSR_DCS_AMT_SUM_AM AS 환급금환급결정액합계금액 , A.RSRAM_HNDL_APP_AMT_SUM_AM AS 환급금처리충당액합계금액 , A.RSRAM_HNDL_APP_TOT_AMT AS 환급금처리충당총액 , A.RSRAM_HNDL_TA_AMT AS 환급금처리계정이체액 , A.RSRAM_HNDL_TA_AMT_SUM_AM AS 환급금처리계정이체액합계금액 , A.CLCT_DCS_AMT AS 징수결정액 , A.TQR_TO_CLCT_DCS_ATAG AS 본분기까지징수결정액누계 , A.RCP_AMT AS 수납액 , A.TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG AS 본분기까지수납액누계 , A.NPM_LO_AMT AS 불납결손액 , A.NPM_LO_AMT_SUM_AM AS 불납결손액합계금액 , A.UNP_AMT AS 미납액 , A.UN_RCP_AMT_SUM_AM AS 미수납액합계금액 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명 , E.RCP_AMT AS AA1 , E.TQR_TO_RCP_ATAG AS BB1 , E.TOT_RCP_AMT AS CC1 , E.RSRAM_HNDL_TA_AMT AS DD1 , E.TOT_CLCT_DCS_AMT AS EE1 , F_AV_ACCMN_NM(A.COPT_CD,A.ACNT_CD,A.BLL_CD,A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO,A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM FROM TWFAACAV055L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV055L E WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYm#
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND A.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND A.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID NOT IN ('51','52') AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD ='02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.PROF_YM = E.PROF_YM AND A.COPT_CD = E.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = E.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = E.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = E.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = E.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND E.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' ORDER BY 증명책임자부호, A.SUM_DVSN_ID, 관목코드

/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_13 */ SELECT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS 증명책임자부호 , A.PROF_YM AS 증명년월 , A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS 합계구분ID , CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' THEN '합계' ELSE A.CHIF_CD||'-'||A.SSEC_CD||'-'||A.ITM_CD||'-'||A.SITM_CD END AS 관목코드 , A.TQR_RCT_AMT AS 본분기영수액 , A.TQR_TO_RCT_ATAG AS 본분기까지영수액누계 , A.TQR_PD_AMT AS 본분기납부액 , A.TQR_TO_PD_ATAG AS 본분기까지납부액누계 , A.UNP_AMT AS 미납액 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명 , F_AV_ACCMN_NM(A.COPT_CD,A.ACNT_CD,A.BLL_CD,A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO,A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM FROM TWFAACAV032L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYm#
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND A.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND A.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD ='02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' ORDER BY 증명책임자부호, A.SUM_DVSN_ID, 관목코드

/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_14 */ SELECT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS 증명책임자부호 , A.PROF_YR || '00' AS 증명년월 , A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS 합계구분ID , CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' THEN '합계' WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' THEN '월계' ELSE A.TAX_SITM_NM END AS 관목코드 , GOP_KND_NM AS 물납종류명 , A.TXTN_NOC AS 과세건수 , A.UNT_NM AS 단위명 , A.COT AS 수량 , A.GOP_RLV_TMT AS 물납해당세액 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명 , F_AV_ACCMN_NM(A.COPT_CD,A.ACNT_CD,A.BLL_CD,A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO,A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM FROM TWFAACAV050L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C WHERE A.PROF_YR = SUBSTR(#strYm#,1,4)
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND A.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND A.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD ='02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' ORDER BY 증명책임자부호, A.SUM_DVSN_ID, A.TAX_SITM_NM

/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_15 */ SELECT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS 증명책임자부호 , A.PROF_YM AS 증명년월 , A.SUM_DVSN_ID AS 합계구분ID , CASE WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '49' THEN '합계' WHEN A.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' THEN '월계' WHEN A.COPT_CD = '129' AND A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO = '001' THEN '전년도' WHEN A.COPT_CD = '129' AND A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO = '002' THEN '현년도' WHEN A.COPT_CD = '131' AND A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO = '001' THEN '과오납환급' WHEN A.COPT_CD = '131' AND A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO = '002' THEN '위약환급' WHEN A.COPT_CD = '131' AND A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO = '003' THEN '조감법환급' ELSE A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO END AS 관목코드 , A.THMN_TRAC_NTF_AMT AS 당월이체통보액 , A.THMN_TO_TRAC_NTF_ATAG AS 당월까지이체통보액누계 , A.THMN_PMT_DCS_AMT AS 당월지급결정액 , A.THMN_TO_PMT_DCS_ATAG AS 당월까지지급결정액누계 , A.THMN_PMT_AMT AS 당월지급액 , A.THMN_TO_PMT_ATAG AS 당월까지지급액누계 , A.TRAC_NTF_NPMT_AMT AS 이체통보미지급액 , A.PMT_DCS_NPMT_AMT AS 지급결정미지급액 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명 , E.THMN_TRAC_NTF_AMT AS AA1 , E.THMN_TO_TRAC_NTF_ATAG AS BB1 , E.THMN_PMT_DCS_AMT AS CC1 , E.THMN_TO_PMT_DCS_ATAG AS DD1 , E.THMN_PMT_AMT AS EE1 , E.THMN_TO_PMT_ATAG AS FF1 , E.TRAC_NTF_NPMT_AMT AS GG1 , F_AV_ACCMN_NM(A.COPT_CD,A.ACNT_CD,A.BLL_CD,A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO,A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM FROM TWFAACAV051L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV051L E WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYm#
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND A.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND A.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
AND A.COPT_CD = B.ACNT_CD AND B.ACNT_DVSN_CD ='02' AND A.ACNT_CD = C.ACNT_CD AND C.ACNT_DVSN_CD = '01' AND A.SUM_DVSN_ID NOT IN ('51','52') AND A.PROF_YM = E.PROF_YM AND A.COPT_CD = E.COPT_CD AND A.ACNT_CD = E.ACNT_CD AND A.BLL_CD = E.BLL_CD AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = E.PROF_DRTR_SRNO AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = E.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AND E.SUM_DVSN_ID = '51' ORDER BY 증명책임자부호, A.SUM_DVSN_ID, A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO

/* faa/cav/009/FAACAV010R_16 */ SELECT A.COPT_CD||'-'||A.ACNT_CD||'-'||A.BLL_CD||'-'||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||'-'||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO AS 증명책임자부호 , A.PROF_YM AS 증명년월 , RTRIM(A.SUM_DVSN_ID) AS 합계구분ID , A.RSRAM_DCS_AMT_NO AS 환급금결정액번호 , A.RSR_CFM_DCS_AMT AS 환급확인결정액 , A.RSR_CFM_DCS_ATAG AS 환급확인결정액누계 , A.APP_AMT AS 충당액 , A.APP_ATAG AS 충당액누계 , A.TRAC_AMT AS 이체액 , A.TRAC_ATAG AS 이체액누계 , A.PMT_AMT AS 지급액 , A.PMT_ATAG AS 지급액누계 , A.DCSAM_NPMT_AMT AS 결정금미지급액 , A.TRACAM_NPMT_AMT AS 이체금미지급액 , B.ACNT_CD_NM AS 소관명 , C.ACNT_CD_NM AS 회계명 , E.RSR_CFM_DCS_AMT AS AA1 , E.RSR_CFM_DCS_ATAG AS BB1 , E.TRAC_AMT AS CC1 , E.TRAC_ATAG AS DD1 , E.PMT_ATAG AS EE1 , E.DCSAM_NPMT_AMT AS FF1 , E.TRACAM_NPMT_AMT AS GG1 , F_AV_ACCMN_NM(A.COPT_CD,A.ACNT_CD,A.BLL_CD,A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO,A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO) AS ORG_NM FROM TWFAACAV018L A, TWFAACAV024C B, TWFAACAV024C C, TWFAACAV018L E WHERE A.PROF_YM = #strYm#
AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO >= #sData# OR '' = #sData#) AND (A.COPT_CD||A.ACNT_CD||A.BLL_CD||A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO||A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO <= #eData# OR '' = #eData#)
AND A.COPT_CD = #strAccmnId1# AND A.ACNT_CD = #strAccmnId2# AND A.BLL_CD = #strAccmnId3# AND A.PROF_DRTR_SRNO = #strAccmnId4# AND A.DL_XPN_RCDB_PBSVT_SRNO = #strAccmnId5#
